page.title: 11TOURISM - ETTRICK VALLEY.
page.content: While farming remains the mainstay of valley life,opportunities afforded by the influx of holiday makers are not overlooked. While one enterprising lady tempts the passing motorist with 'Scone Teas' and also offers bed and breakfast facilities, another runs a small stable with pony trekking facilities. A caravan and camping site is fully booked during the summer months. An old and well-known Inn is situated in this area and fishing and walking holidays are popular. The area is also ideal for bird wstching and occasinally a local farm has bed and breakfast facilities. It is an area popular with tourists drawn by the peace and tranquility which exists.
